original_text: Then the priest will make things right with God for all the Israelites. The Lord will forgive them. That is because their sin was a mistake. They have brought their offering, an offering by fire to the Lord. And they have brought their sin offering to the Lord, for their mistake.
korean_text: 제사장이 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중을 위하여 속죄하면 그들이 사함을 받으리니 이는 그가 부지중에 범죄함이며 또 부지중에 범죄함으로 말미암아 헌물 곧 화제와 속죄제를 여호와께 드렸음이라

sentences.original_text: Then the priest will make things right with God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 제사장은 하나님과 관계를 바로잡을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: That is because their sin was a mistake
an offering by fire to the Lord
And they have brought their sin offering to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 자신들의 죄제물을 주님께 가져왔습니다
